20110119161601.000|20110119161601.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110119161601.000|20110119161604.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110119161604.000|20110119161604.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110119161604.000|20110119161604.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110119161604.000|20110119161607.000|CC1|         young adults.

20110119161607.000|20110119161610.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110119161610.000|20110119161610.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110119161610.000|20110119161612.000|CC1|          thioridazine
